tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am a 67 year old retired banking official who is a diabetic patient. In the month of November 2022, I had breathlessness and I visited Aster RV Hospital. The Doctors - Dr.Venkatesh S was very quick to diagnose the problem as Heart Failure and his treatment was instrumental in me coming out of a very critical condition. Dr.Venkatesh immediately did Angiogram and found that there were severe blockages and since my condition at that time was not that good, Dr.Venkatesh took a very right decision to treat me medically and allowed me enough time to gain strength to withstand heart bypass surgery. Later, I had an incident of irregular heart beats on 8th Feb 2023 and I immediately contacted Dr.Venkatesh S who was kind enough to give timely suggestion. I was then admitted to Aster RV and my pulse rate was first stabilized. Dr.Venkatesh never does anything unwantedly and his decisions are always backed by scientific evidence. I was then suggested a PET scan to check if my heart tissues are alive and only upon those findings, Dr.Venkatesh S suggested that heart bypass would be a good solution for my condition. Since my heart pumping was weak, Dr.Venkatesh S again using all his experience suggested to use IABP(Balloon) to take the load off my heart during surgery. This was a very critical decision and helped the Cardio-Thoracic Surgeon Dr.Divakar Bhat during the Surgery to control the heart. Dr.Venkatesh S is a very kind and approachable doctor who is always available to the patient and their attendants. He is methodical in his approach and never does anything unwantedly. He is a thorough gentleman and a great Cardiologist with excellent knowledge and a person with a touch of humanity. I will always be indebted to Dr.Venkatesh S for his great help to our family and he is a God Sent Angel to our family. Not only our case, we have seen so many patients and families being saved by his great acumen and skillset.
Dr.Venkatesh S also took a great decision of implanting ICD for my case which has the potential to be a life saver for patients like me. ICD Operation also was performed very well by his team.
I owe my recovery to Dr.Venkatesh S. Entire Cardiology team is very hardworking and Dr.Venkatesh S is kind enough to take a call anytime of the day or night to help save lives.
Aster RV Hospital has the best Cardiology and Cardio-Thoracic team in the world and is on par with any of the best hospitals of the world. If you are looking for Cardiac Care with a human touch, then Aster RV is the place to go.

tags: None
review: The doctor is very much friendly.  Hospital staff are very much helpful. As the appointment was considered as walk-in still due to the lack of people who already had appointment were less, I got a chance to meet doctor immediately. Thanks to staff for arranging.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We visited Dr. Venkatesh for my grand father who had exertional chest pain. 
Dr. Venkatesh was very patient and listened to the elaborate history narrated by my grandfather. He was attentive, compassionate and did not interrupt 
He was also very prudent in prescribing only the most important and required tests and did not ask for tests that will strain my grandfather.
He explained the condition to us in detail *** ******* ** **** ** ***** ** ********** **** *** ***** ********* *** **** ***** *** ** **** ** ******* ******* ********** ** ********** 
We are happy to be in the safe care of Dr. Venkatesh and would recommend him to anyone with a cardiac condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Venkatesh has been my parents cardiologist for more than a decade now. A thorough gentleman, maestro on the subject, who is approachable, compassionate  listens and understands the underlying issues with right evaluations techniques (clinical, physical and pathological) before prescribing anything.  We are happy to be in the safe care of Dr. Venkatesh and would recommend him to anyone with a cardiac condition. Thanks Dr Venkatesh for all you have done to Mr Krishnan and family.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have consulted Dr. S. Venkatesh for typical chest pain. Some tests like ECG, Treadmill test were carried out and Dr. Sir, diagnosed and informed me that it is not heart related and also instructed me very well, which boost up the confidence level in me that I am OK. He is very friendly and genius. I am very grateful to Dr. Sir and heartily thanks to HEART GENIUS DR. S. VENKATESH

tags: None
review: It was a wonderful experience with Doctor and my mother feel so confident because doctor explained each and everything in detail by taking time. Doctor only focus on what tests are required and what are minimum medications are required. I really recommend doctor for cardiac issue and appreciate doctor's attitude and respect for patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** * ********* ** *** ** *** **** ************ *** ****** We consulted him once and then there was no turning back. My father,A P Singh,  underwent multiple heart surgeries and it was of utmost importance to us to keep his heart healthy. We consulted him and I can say with due diligence that his heart is healthy just because of him. He is very approachable and as a Doctor the person to go too. He is always available at difficult times. It's 10 years now but it looks like yesterday.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Recently, I was visiting Bangalore and consulted Dr. Venkatesh regarding cardiac issues. I found him the most experienced and highly balanced to give proper advice. I was deeply impressed by his experience on cardiac issues and he gave me a sound treatment. I strongly recommend Dr. Venkatesh for cardiac consultations. 

M.Kaushik
Retired Indian Foreign Service Officer

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I HAVE VISITED DR VENKATSH S FOR MY FATHER'S HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE  
/ANGINA . HE INITIALLY GOT TREATED IN HOME TOWN LUCKNOW WITH MANY REPUTED HEART SPECIALIST WITHOUT ANY IMPROVEMENT . AFTER VISITING DR VENKATESH , HIS BLOOD PRESSURE IS NORMAL NOW AND EVEN  MEDICINES  AND THEIR DOSES GOT DECREASED .

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND DR VENKATESH
